item.title: The Cast of Broadway’s ‘Mamma Mia’ Revival Owe Their Sun-Kissed Glows to This Greek Skincare Brand
item.description: While belting ABBA from Broadway’s Winter Garden Theatre this summer, the cast of “Mamma Mia” will boast sun-kissed glows only fitting for a Greek island-hopping dramedy — all
